OOC: 4 shits? Hehehe.

BIC: Blot: Blot be maaaad! No fightsing!

Blot fires=
 his slime gun at Cutthroat...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Lur=
kerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 9:48 =
PM
  Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


  ::Cut=
throat::
   
        Cutthroat, being a copycat, and not wanting to lose an=
 advantage, also transformed to robot mode.  He stood still, and the 4 shit=
s hit him in the chest.  He looked a little dumbfounded for a moment, then =
whipped out his gun and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr.
   
  OOC: Ok, I just=
 said gun 'cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat has in robot mode.
   =

    From: Alloran2@...
